name: The Final Build
description:
The Final Build is the game made for Backtrace 2021 Game Jam with the theme "It's not a BUG !"

The main idea was I wanted to create a game and have certain bugs which will help you in completing/Progressing the game. These are termed by QA as BUG , but as a DEV ,I would say that "It's not a BUG , It's a Feature , my friend !"  This is what I interpreted from the given THEME as.

Best PLAYED at 1980 X 1080 ,WIN

Known Issues-

-It's already RELEASED !

Source Code - https://github.com/Sidzzero/gamejam_backtrace 

.

With that in mind ,the Game has a collider on the pause menu which help you in playing the game. Even though it's a Blocker Issue (Damn the Junior Dev and his/her code ! ) , it still ends up fun to play and even Gets Released !
